mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , a.mem_id , TO_CHAR(a.board_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') as board_date , b.mem_name FROM boards a , members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_no DESC

SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , a.mem_id , TO_CHAR(a.board_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') as board_date , b.mem_name FROM boards a , members b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.board_no = #{boardNo}
